title: Calesthenic Plan
intro: Calisthenics or callisthenics is a form of strength training consisting of a variety of movements that exercise large muscle groups, such as standing, grasping, pushing, etc.

title: Body Building
intro: Bodybuilding is the use of progressive resistance exercise to control and develop ones muscles by muscle hypertrophy for aesthetic purposes.

title: Fitness
intro: Keep your body fit and feal a healthy life,To be physically fit you should have: 1) aerobic (cardiovascular) endurance, which is the ability of your heart and lungs to supply oxygen during sustained physical activity; 2) muscular endurance and strength to perform activity without fatigue and with the force needed to do the job

title: Fat reduce
intro: The scientific term for body fat is adipose tissue. ... The amount of essential fat differs between men and women, and is typically around 2-5% in men, and 10-13% in women. The healthy range of body fat for men is typically defined as 8-19%, while the healthy range for women is 21-33%.
